about_the_game:
Race Fast, Race others, Race Me Now!


Race sneaky opponents in beautiful surroundings. Races are fast and ruthless, other drivers will try to push you out of the road to take your place. Will you be able to push them out first? Will you be able to beat them all? Will you become the champion?

Features


Race Fast
Compete with sneaky opponents. Enjoy unique driving mechanics.


Race to win
Win to unlock. Unlock 40 new cars. Unlock 4 new car categories.


Race to master
Master racing in 4 beautiful racetracks. Master racing 40 different cars.


Race me now
Add Race Me Now to your wishlist and follow us on social media.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
